name: Countdown Creek
description:
( NOTE: Browser version may be slow, please play windows version if possible )

Controls :

- ( Requires a mouse )

- WASD / ZQSD = movement

- Left click = shoot

- Mouse = aim
- R = start / restart the game

Your health will rapidly decrease when on the red portions of the timer
Kill enemies to delay the timer
Getting hit by enemy bullets will decrease the timer


Like what you see ? :) Follow me on Twitter Join our Discord
